name: stick
effect: Held by Farfetch’d: Raises the holder’s critical hit counter by 2.
short_effect: Raises Farfetch’d’s critical hit ratio by two stages.

flavor_text.ruby_sapphire: A stick of leek. It can be sold cheaply.
flavor_text.emerald: A hold item that raises FARFETCH’D’s critical-hit ratio.
flavor_text.firered_leafgreen: A stick of leek to be held by a FARFETCH’D. It raises FARFETCH’D’s critical-hit ratio.
